member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.BorderEffect
member.summary: Extends an image to infinite size, specifying whether areas beyond its original extents are filled by repeating pixels from the edges of the image, wrapping pixels from the opposite edge of the image, or mirroring the image.

remarks.p: This Windows Runtime type corresponds to the D2D Border effect.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.BorderEffect.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the BorderEffect class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.BorderEffect.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the input source for Border effect.
member.remarks: This property is initialized to null.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.BorderEffect.ExtendX
member.summary: Specifies how content is tiled horizontally when it extends beyond the image. Default value .

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.BorderEffect.ExtendY
member.summary: Specifies how content is tiled vertically when it extends beyond the image. Default value .
